about_the_game:
Monkey Tag Arena - is a fun and adventurous online multiplayer game. The game is very simple and at the same time very interesting.

There are 3 game modes:

Tag Mode: There are 2 roles, you can play as a hunter or as a runner. If you are a hunter you have to catch all the other runners. If you are a runner, you have to survive without being caught, if you are caught, you become a hunter. The game has 8 great arenas: Aquapark, Spaceship, Magic Forest, Mayhem Castle, Antique Ruins, Pirate Bay, Temple Wilds and Crystal Mine. Each arena has fun challenges and secret hideaways.

Monkey Run Mode: The first monkey to reach the finish line is the winner.

Open World Mode: This mode allows you to explore all maps and interact with other players.

When you create a room, you can share the room name with your friends so they can connect with you and play together. Or you can create a party and join a game with your entire party.

You can customise your monkey's skin, texture and outfit. There are lots of clothes and textures to choose from, so don't hesitate to create your own original monkey.

Download the game now and start your adventure today!

Monkey Tag Arena - is a fun and adventurous online multiplayer game. The game is very simple and at the same time very interesting.

The game has 8 great arenas: Aquapark, Spaceship, Magic Forest, Mayhem Castle, Antique Ruins, Pirate Bay, Temple Wilds and Crystal Mine. Each arena has fun challenges and secret hideaways.

Monkey Run Mode: The first monkey to reach the finish line is the winner.

When you create a room, you can share the room name with your friends so they can connect with you and play together. Or you can create a party and join a game with your entire party.

You can customise your monkey's skin, texture and outfit. There are lots of clothes and textures to choose from, so don't hesitate to create your own original monkey.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 / Radeon RX 560X
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1, Intel
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Monkey Tag Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 / Radeon RX 560X
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Hide and run from the hunters, or catch them if you are a hunter. The game has many arenas and 3 modes: - Monkey run mode.- Tag mode.- Open world.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
